definition: electrical device consisting of a flat insulated surface that contains switches and dials and meters for controlling other electrical devices, select from a list
details:
noun
- electrical device consisting of a flat insulated surface that contains switches and dials and meters for controlling other electrical devices
= example: electrical device consisting of a flat insulated surface that contains switches and dials and meters for controlling other electrical devices
= synonyms: board
- (computer science) a small temporary window in a graphical user interface that appears in order to request information from the user
= synonyms: dialog box
- a piece of cloth that is generally triangular or tapering
= synonyms: gore
- sheet that forms a distinct (usually flat and rectangular) section or component of something
- a soft pad placed under a saddle
- a group of people gathered for a special purpose as to plan or discuss an issue or judge a contest etc
- (law) a group of people summoned for jury service (from whom a jury will be chosen)
= synonyms: venire
- a committee appointed to judge a competition
= synonyms: jury
verb
- select from a list
= example: select from a list
= synonyms: empanel, impanel
- decorate with panels
= example: decorate with panels
